game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, you are the last hope to save the realm from destruction. You must navigate through ancient ruins, solve puzzles, and battle fearsome creatures to uncover the secrets of the lost city of Eldarath.
game.beginning: You awaken in a mysterious tavern with no memory of who you are or how you got there. The bartender informs you that you have been found unconscious near an ancient portal, which has disappeared without explanation. As you leave the tavern, you notice a strange energy emanating from the nearby forest.
game.ending: With the help of newfound allies and your own determination, you uncover the dark forces behind the disappearance of magic and the true purpose of Eldarath's existence. You face off against the mastermind in an epic battle to restore balance to the realm and bring light back to the world.
